verses.verse: I am <S%H935>come<s%> into my <S%H1588>garden,<s%> my <S%H269>sister,<s%> my <S%H3618>spouse:<s%> I have <S%H717>gathered<s%> my <S%H4753>myrrh<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> my <S%H1313>spice;<s%> I have <S%H398>eaten<s%> my <S%H3293>honeycomb<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> my <S%H1706>honey;<s%> I have <S%H8354>drunk<s%> my <S%H3196>wine<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> my <S%H2461>milk:<s%> <S%H398>eat,<s%> O <S%H7453>friends;<s%> <S%H8354>drink,<s%> yea, drink <S%H7937>abundantly,<s%> O <S%H1730>beloved.<s%>

I <S%H589><s%> <S%H3463>sleep,<s%> but my <S%H3820>heart<s%> <S%H5782>waketh:<s%> it is the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of my <S%H1730>beloved<s%> that <S%H1849>knocketh,<s%> saying, <S%H6605>Open<s%> to me, my <S%H269>sister,<s%> my <S%H7474>love,<s%> my <S%H3123>dove,<s%> my <S%H8535>undefiled:<s%> for my <S%H7945>head<s%> <S%H7218><s%> is <S%H4390>filled<s%> with <S%H2919>dew,<s%> and my <S%H6977>locks<s%> with the <S%H7447>drops<s%> of the <S%H3915>night.<s%>

I have put <S%H6584>off<s%> <S%H853><s%> my <S%H3801>coat;<s%> <S%H349>how<s%> shall I put it <S%H3847>on?<s%> I have <S%H7364>washed<s%> <S%H853><s%> my <S%H7272>feet;<s%> <S%H349>how<s%> shall I <S%H2936>defile<s%> them?
My <S%H1730>beloved<s%> put <S%H7971>in<s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H4480>by<s%> the <S%H2356>hole<s%> of the door, and my <S%H4578>bowels<s%> were <S%H1993>moved<s%> <S%H5921>for<s%> him.

I <S%H589><s%> rose <S%H6965>up<s%> to <S%H6605>open<s%> to my <S%H1730>beloved;<s%> and my <S%H3027>hands<s%> <S%H5197>dropped<s%> with <S%H4753>myrrh,<s%> and my <S%H676>fingers<s%> with sweet <S%H5674>smelling<s%> <S%H4753>myrrh,<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H3709>handles<s%> of the <S%H4514>lock.<s%>

I <S%H589><s%> <S%H6605>opened<s%> to my <S%H1730>beloved;<s%> but my <S%H1730>beloved<s%> had <S%H2559>withdrawn<s%> himself, and was <S%H5674>gone:<s%> my <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H3318>failed<s%> when he <S%H1696>spoke:<s%> I <S%H1245>sought<s%> him, but I could <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H4672>find<s%> him; I <S%H7121>called<s%> him, but he gave me no <S%H3808>answer.<s%> <S%H6030><s%>

The <S%H8104>watchmen<s%> that went <S%H5437>about<s%> the <S%H5892>city<s%> <S%H4672>found<s%> me, they <S%H5221>smote<s%> me, they <S%H6481>wounded<s%> me; the <S%H8104>keepers<s%> of the <S%H2346>walls<s%> took <S%H5375>away<s%> <S%H853><s%> my <S%H7289>veil<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> <S%H5921><s%> me.

I <S%H7650>charge<s%> you, O <S%H1323>daughters<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> <S%H518>if<s%> ye <S%H4672>find<s%> <S%H853><s%> my <S%H1730>beloved,<s%> <S%H4100>that<s%> ye <S%H5046>tell<s%> him, that <S%H589>I<s%> am <S%H7945>sick<s%> <S%H2470><s%> of <S%H160>love.<s%>

What <S%H4100><s%> is thy <S%H1730>beloved<s%> more than another <S%H4480>beloved,<s%> <S%H1730><s%> O thou <S%H3303>fairest<s%> among <S%H802>women?<s%> <S%H4100>what<s%> is thy <S%H1730>beloved<s%> more than another <S%H4480>beloved,<s%> <S%H1730><s%> that thou dost <S%H7945>so<s%> <S%H3602><s%> <S%H7650>charge<s%> us?
My <S%H1730>beloved<s%> is <S%H6703>white<s%> and <S%H122>ruddy,<s%> the <S%H1713>chiefest<s%> among ten <S%H4480>thousand.<s%> <S%H7233><s%>
His <S%H7218>head<s%> is as the <S%H3800>most<s%> fine <S%H6337>gold,<s%> his <S%H6977>locks<s%> are <S%H8534>bushy,<s%> and <S%H7838>black<s%> as a <S%H6158>raven.<s%>

His <S%H5869>eyes<s%> are as the eyes of <S%H3123>doves<s%> <S%H5921>by<s%> the <S%H650>rivers<s%> of <S%H4325>waters,<s%> <S%H7364>washed<s%> with <S%H2461>milk,<s%> and fitly <S%H4402>set.<s%> <S%H3427><s%>

His <S%H3895>cheeks<s%> are as a <S%H6170>bed<s%> of <S%H1314>spices,<s%> as <S%H4840>sweet<s%> <S%H4026>flowers:<s%> his <S%H8193>lips<s%> like <S%H7799>lilies,<s%> <S%H5197>dropping<s%> sweet <S%H5674>smelling<s%> <S%H4753>myrrh.<s%>

His <S%H3027>hands<s%> are as <S%H2091>gold<s%> <S%H1550>rings<s%> <S%H4390>set<s%> with the <S%H8658>beryl:<s%> his <S%H4578>belly<s%> is as <S%H6247>bright<s%> <S%H8127>ivory<s%> <S%H5968>overlaid<s%> with <S%H5601>sapphires.<s%>

His <S%H7785>legs<s%> are as <S%H5982>pillars<s%> of <S%H8336>marble,<s%> <S%H3245>set<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> <S%H134>sockets<s%> of fine <S%H6337>gold:<s%> his <S%H4758>countenance<s%> is as <S%H3844>Lebanon,<s%> <S%H977>excellent<s%> as the <S%H730>cedars.<s%>

His <S%H2441>mouth<s%> is most <S%H4477>sweet:<s%> yea, he is <S%H3605>altogether<s%> <S%H4261>lovely.<s%> <S%H2088>This<s%> is my <S%H1730>beloved,<s%> and <S%H2088>this<s%> is my <S%H7453>friend,<s%> O <S%H1323>daughters<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%>
